resources.string:
Mirrors

Description

There are two mirrors : an horizontal and a vertical. If you enabled a mirror effect, your stroke will be reflected respectively horizontally and vertically. You can enabled both in the same time but you can not enable the Kaleidoscope effect and the mirrors.

Kaleidoscope

Description

This effect will rotate around the canvas center your stroke several time. The default rotation number is 6 and can be chosen in the extra settings. You can not enabled a mirror effect and the kaleidoscope in the same time.

Fill mode

Description

Your stroke will produce filled shape and not line anymore. Click again on the icon to go back in the stroke mode. Some brush doesn\'t support the fill mode.

Stroke mode

Description

Your stroke will produce line. Click on the icon to go in the fill mode.

Unicolor mode

Description

Your stroke will only use the main color (see Colors). Click on the icon to enter in gradient mode.

Gradient mode

Description

A linear gradient from top left to bottom right using both the main and the secondary colors will colorize your stroke. If you use a mirror or kaleidoscope effect, the gradient will be affected as well. Click on the icon to go back in mode.
